quote: The chanting went on, the musicians giving in to the rhythm of their own being, finding healing in touching that rhythm, and healing in chanting about death, the only real god they knew.
quote_letters: THE CHANTING WENT ON THE MUSICIANS GIVING IN TO THE RHYTHM OF THEIR OWN BEING FINDING HEALING IN TOUCHING THAT RHYTHM AND HEALING IN CHANTING ABOUT DEATH THE ONLY REAL GOD THEY KNEW
